name: TeleMirror
description: App helps mirroring newly created post from Telegram channels.

CHAT_MAPPING.description: Chat mapping. Example: [(source_id|source_title|linked_chat_id),...:(target_id|linked_chat_id)];.... 'linked_chat_id' is optional, 'source_title' must be enclosed in double quotes

KEYWORD_DO_NOT_FORWARD_MAP.description: Comma-separated list words to stop forwarding. Leave empty to disable. Example: stop,word

URL_FILTER_LIST.description: Comma-separated list urls to remove. Leave empty to disable. Example: google.com,t.me/test

KEYWORD_REPLACE_MAP.description: Comma-separated list keywords to replace. Leave empty to disable. Example: cat:dog,one:two

DISABLE_COMMENT_CLONE.description: Disable comment cloning. Defaults to false

DISABLE_DELETE.description: Disable mirror message deleting (true or false). Defaults to false

DISABLE_EDIT.description: Disable mirror message editing (true or false). Defaults to false

USE_MEMORY_DB.description: Use an in-memory database instead of Postgres DB (true or false). Defaults to false

LOG_LEVEL.description: Logging level (debug, info, warning, error or critical). Defaults to info
